sentence.Network_en: Topographical detail visible in daylight is printed in subdued colours.
sentence.Network_cn: 白昼可见的地形起伏部采用色调柔和的颜色印刷.

sentence.Network_en: Topographical maps not only show planimetric position but also indicate relief by some method.
sentence.Network_cn: 地形图不仅表示出平面位置,而且还通过某种方法显示地貌.

sentence.Network_en: Experts can combine pictures taken from airplanes and satellites with topographical data.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们能把航空和卫星照片与地形数据结合起来.

entry.def: A topographical survey or map relates to or shows the physical features of an area of land, for example its hills, valleys, and rivers.

auth_sentence.content: Scientists will then compare gravitational and topographical maps of the lunar surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scientists will then compare gravitational and topographical maps of the lunar surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scientists will then compare gravitational and topographical maps of the lunar surface.
